title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks drop, indexes post weekly losses as Russia-Ukraine concerns outweigh strong jobs data - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks drop, indexes post weekly losses as Russia-Ukraine concerns outweigh strong jobs data  Yahoo Finance
description: Stocks fell Friday as investors eyed a much stronger-than-expected report on the labor market's recovery and continued to monitor for global economic fallout from Russia's war in Ukraine.
